trans-unit.source: Generates types and attribute declarations from internal type mapping information for SOAP-encoded message parts defined in a WSDL document.

The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter> class is used by the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88) and the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImporter> class while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
Instead of using <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter> directly, use Wsdl.exe.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref> class, assuming no code compile unit.
Instead of directly creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter> class, use the Wsdl.exe tool.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that specifies the namespace of the types to generate.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref> class, specifying a code compile unit parameter in addition to a namespace parameter.
Instead of directly creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter> class, use the Wsdl.exe tool.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that specifies the namespace of the types to generate.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> that identifies the program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref> class, specifying a code namespace, a code compile unit, and code generation options.
Instead of directly creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter> class, use the Wsdl.exe tool.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that specifies the namespace of the types to generate.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> that identifies the program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> enumeration that specifies the options with which exported code is generated.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref> class, specifying a code namespace, a code compile unit, code generation options, and mappings.
Instead of directly creating an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter> class, use the Wsdl.exe tool.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that specifies the namespace of the types to generate.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> that identifies the program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> enumeration that specifies the options with which exported code is generated.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping"></xref> objects.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter"></xref> class, specifying a code namespace, a code compile unit, a code generator, code generation options, and mappings.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeNamespace"></xref> that specifies the namespace of the types to generate.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCompileUnit"></xref> that identifies the program graph container to which used assembly references are automatically added.
A <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider"></xref> that is used to create the code.
A <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> enumeration that specifies the options with which exported code is generated.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Hashtable"></xref> that contains <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlMapping"></xref> objects.

Add a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref> declaration to a method parameter or return value corresponding to a part element of a SOAP message definition in a WSDL document.
This method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
The collection of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref> objects for the generated type, to which the method adds an attribute declaration.
An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single part of a WSDL message definition.

Adds a <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref> declaration to a method parameter or return value that corresponds to a part element of a SOAP message definition in a WSDL document.
This method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
The collection of <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclaration"></xref> objects for the generated type to which the method adds an attribute declaration.
An internal .NET Framework type mapping for a single part of a WSDL message definition.
`true` to add an initial argument that contains the XML element name for the attribute declaration that is being generated; otherwise, `false`.
Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for each of the parts that belong to a SOAP message definition in a WSDL document.
This method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
Internal .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.
Generates a .NET Framework type, plus attribute declarations, for a SOAP header.
This method is used by the Wsdl.exe tool.
Internal .NET Framework type mapping information for a SOAP header element.
